title: Looking for Old Judge Detroit Wolverines
author: cobbcobb13

posts.post_title: Looking for Old Judge Detroit Wolverines
posts.post_content:
My search continues.

If you have a graded or raw OJ Detroit for sale shoot me a message.

Hello Derek, hope the collection is going well.  Are you looking for only 1887 Detroits or all years, single card of each player or all poses?  Hopefully you were able to add to your collection this past Spring when Joe Maples consigned many Detroit OJs to REA.  All the best !

Thanks Joe! Yes I was able to add a few poses. 
I'm looking for any / all Old Judge Detroit Wolverines. Adding as I age :)
